value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)
value.excerpt: The standard competitive mode in StarCraft 2 is 1v1. However the OlimoLeague recently put on an event where they invited three teams of progamers to face off in a 2v2 (2 vs 2) event.
